name: Safari Kart
description:
Safari Kart is an brand new 3D Kart Racing Game for all ages. Boost, drift and use power-ups to win your trophies!

Race from volcanic jungles to freezing cold ice lakes, unlocking new tracks and characters. Can you be the one to champion all of the Cups?

IT'S A WILD RIDE!
-Choose from eight colorful characters
-Compete in 12 unique tracks
-Use different power-ups to gain an edge!
-Drift around corners for a boost
-Three difficulty levels from novice to racing experts
-Premium game with no in-game ads or extra purchases!
